properties.name: zeldaspeedruns.superuser.username
properties.description: Username for the automatically generated superuser.

properties.name: zeldaspeedruns.superuser.email-address
properties.description: Email address for the automatically generated superuser.

properties.name: zeldaspeedruns.superuser.password
properties.description: Password for the automatically generated superuser.

properties.name: zeldaspeedruns.superuser.create-superuser
properties.description: If true, creates a superuser account with the values set in username, email-address and password.
